snippet: The police officer was wounded while pursuing a man at a city housing project, the authorities said.
abstract: Plainclothes New York City Police Officer Kevin Brennan is shot in the face while pursuing a man in a housing project in the Bushwick section of Brooklyn after a report of a man with a gun; Brennan is expected to make a full recovery; suspected gunman Luis Ortiz is captured in a nearby building.

byline.original: By MATT FLEGENHEIMER and CHRISTOPHER MAAG
byline.contributor: Al Baker, Joseph Goldstein and Stacey Stowe contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The police officer was wounded while pursuing a man at a city housing project, the authorities said.

headline.seo: Police Officer Is Shot in the Face at a Brooklyn Housing Project
headline.main: Officer Shot in Head in Brooklyn; Full Recovery Is Expected
headline.print_headline: Officer Shot in Head in Brooklyn; Full Recovery Is Expected
